message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which I believe would greatly benefit you. Considering its value and quality, I propose a price of $140 for it. This is a special offer tailored just for you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value and quality of your product. I would like to counteroffer at $130.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your position and am willing to consider it. To continue our negotiation, I propose a price of $135 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Based on my budget constraints, I would like to counteroffer at $130.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. After careful consideration, I am willing to accept a price of $132 for the product. I believe this is a fair compromise given the value it provides to you.
